string.description: Text displayed on a prompt that asks the user if they would like to install an app on a watch device. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_install_app_prompt_title

string.description: Label displayed on button to confirm that the user would like to install the app. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]
string.name: horologist_install_app_prompt_ok_btn_label

string.description: Label displayed on button to dismiss the prompt to install the app. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]
string.name: horologist_install_app_prompt_cancel_btn_label
